s: The universal nature of the Flipper Remote is a game-changer. It's compatible with all major TV brands and most set-top boxes, including cable and satellite providers like Xfinity, Spectrum, and Dish. This compatibility ensures that users can control both their TV and their set-top box with just one remote, eliminating the clutter and confusion of multiple remotes. Currently we don't support streaming devices like Roku, Apple TV, and Amazon ...
